title: Gut renovated 1 Bedroom, features new cherry hardwood floors.
posting_body: Gut renovated 1 Bedroom, features new cherry hardwood floors, gorgeous marble floor, open renovated kitchen with granite counter/island seating and stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher and mounted microwave.
Large living room and open layout allow for easy furnishing.
Enjoy the light from 2 large windows with a view of The Armory Large bedroom will fit bed and dressers.
Easy access to several MBTA stops, bus lines, shopping, dining, entertainment and downtown.
Close to Northeastern University, Berklee, Boston Conservatory etc.
